title: USC Games Demo Day
desc: Demo Day is an exhibition where students in the joint Advanced Games Course have the opportunity to premiere their newest and most innovate games from the semester. It is a collaborative effort between the School of Cinematic Arts? Interactive Media & Games Division and the Viterbi School of Engineering?s Department of Computer Science, with participating students from SCA?s Animation, Writing, MA+P, Production and Cinema & Media Studies divisions, as well as from across the USC campus.? Career Fair:  9am-12pm? Industry Panel:   Bridging the Gap Between Student Work and Successful Start-Up:? 1pm-2pm Live Demos:  2pm-5pm
